divs: Sighting DetailsObserved August 2, 2013 from Emmaus PA looking toward Allentown in the North East sky. Witnessed by myself and 3 others witnessed one orange glowing orb floating up ward and to the East then just diapered.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Emmaus
There were no other sightings in Emmaus on or around August 2nd 2013
Summary: 8/2/13 ~ 9:30 pm est Orange glowing orb light in north eastern sky Lehigh valley Pa
